mapper.select: SELECT alarm.alarm_id AS alarmId, alarm.post_id AS postId, alarm.comment_id AS commentId, comment.comment_content AS alarmContent, users.user_name AS userName, comment.comment_register_time AS registerTime, alarm.is_read AS isRead FROM alarms alarm JOIN comments comment ON alarm.comment_id = comment.comment_id JOIN users ON comment.user_id = users.user_id JOIN posts ON comment.post_id = posts.post_id WHERE alarm.tagged_user_id = #{user.userId} AND users.company_id = #{user.companyId} AND posts.post_status = 'normal' UNION SELECT alarm.alarm_id AS alarmId, alarm.post_id AS postId, alarm.comment_id AS commentId, '' AS alarmContent, users.user_name AS userName, post.post_register_time AS registerTime, alarm.is_read AS isRead FROM alarms alarm JOIN posts post ON alarm.post_id = post.post_id JOIN users ON post.user_id = users.user_id WHERE alarm.tagged_user_id = #{user.userId} AND users.company_id = #{user.companyId} AND alarm.comment_id IS NULL AND post.post_status = 'normal' ORDER BY registerTime DESC LIMIT #{startIndex}, #{pageSize};
SELECT alarm_id AS alarmId, tagged_user_id AS taggedUserId, post_id AS postId, comment_id AS commentId, is_read AS isRead FROM alarms WHERE alarm_id = #{alarmId};
